name: Eggheadz Memory Match
description:
Eggheadz Memory Match is a classic card matching puzzle to challenging and improve your memory. Great for any age -- 14 different layouts provide difficulty levels suitable to test the memory of kids and adults alike. Eggheadz Memory Match is an excellent memory and concentration trainer for the entire family.

Tap to reveal pairs of cards and find the matches - how many can you remember? Many different variations, including several with a more difficult match three game for the ultimate test of memory. Is your memory ready for this brain teaser?

Match up all of the cards quickly, and in the fewest number of moves, to earn the highest score. Statistics are kept for each layout - play again to beat your time, number of moves, or both; or turn off all score-keeping for younger children if you wish.

Get Eggheadz Memory Match today and give your memory the workout is deserves!
